subject: Running all tests multiple times with different fixture
msgSnippet: Hi, My project provide an unified API with different implementations. So, I would like to run automatically all the JUnit tests with the first implementation,
messageBody:
Hi,

My project provide an unified API with different implementations.

So, I would like to run automatically all the JUnit tests with the
first implementation, then all the Junit tests with the second one, ...

How can I do this, saying that my tests use Jetty, and I would like to
run Jetty only one time before all tests, and stop Jetty after each
implementation is tested.

Thanks
